text: wbshhadth tstwjb alzwjt euqubat alzna, wahi alrjm hataa almwt, wala yadfae eanha hadhih aleuqubat 'iilaa 'an tashhad fi mqabl shahadatih 'arbae shahadat biallah 'iinah lkadhb fi aitihamih laha balzna, wtzyd fi alshahadat alkhamisat aldaewat ealaa nafsiha basthqaqha ghadab allh, 'iin kan zawjiha sadqana fa aitihamah lha, wafi hadhih alhal yufraq bynhma
